column4: I was having the " Xlib:  extension "XFree86-DRI" missing on display" problem and was told to start programs with something in front in the terminal... It was something like "DISPLAY:1 cedega"..can someone help me?
im being told that the display:0 command cant be found
i dont know the command.  i just know 0 is default display so unless someone logged in before you, itll be 0
